metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR++ LAUNCHER OBFUSCATION - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND script.script_content.value rlike '\(?i\)&&set.*\(\\\{\\d\\\}\)\{2,\}\\\\"\\s\+?-f.*&&.*cmd.*/c')

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER
